channel.title: Help with a code 639

item.title: Help with a code 639
item.dc:creator: @omgomgomgl omgomgomgl
item.description:
@omgomgomgl wrote:

I just figured out how to get custom titles to look right on my server and I use this code.

if (p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase(“eclipse”)) {
appearanceData.writeRS2String("<col=8904B1><shad=000000> Owner </shad" +Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(p.getUsername()));
}

But When I go to log in on another account It will not let me… it gives me a errors and logs me out. But not when I log in to eclipse account… help!

Read full topic
